Articles.Content:
This biplane is powered solely by RCS, so has no unsightly engines on it, and is a very silent runner.

Able to take off and land under its own power, multiple tanks give a respectable flight time for an RCS plane. Also, as an added bonus, it looks like a biplane!

Instructions:

Hit R and T to turn on RCS and avionics. Hold H to speed up, and pull back on the stick to lift off. Flies very stable, if a little nose-down. Trimming is optional.
You have my praise, good sir! This is a neat little plane.
Looks nice! love stock planes. downloading now, tell you what i think later.
Look at this biplane. Compare it http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/24534-Zokesia-Skunkworks-(Engineering-the-Future!)/page158?highlight=victory143

It's cool, but a few modifications:

The fuselage doesn't connect on to the nosecone, maybe add a NCS adapter?

You're connecting fuel between the wings?

This thread is more than a year old, fellas.

In future, instead of bumping the thread by posting "hey, don't necro, not cool!", just use the Report Post button, okay? There is no need to worsen the necro by keeping the year-old thread at the top of the forum. Thanks ^.^

Thread locked
